participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, yet carries a sense of loss that shapes his outlook on life.
participant_1.background: my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

participant_2.name: Priya
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, she often challenges traditional norms and embraces new experiences.
participant_2.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.
